00037 const std::string TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE = "../data/test.file.data_dat";

00065 /*
00066  * Test retrieving a DataGroup configured to read data using memory-mapping
00067  */
00068 void GenericDataFileBasedTest::DataGroupMMTest()
00069 {
00070         GenericData data;
00071         GenericFileReader reader;
00072         reader.SetFilename(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE);
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data, GenericFileReader::ReadNoDataGroupHeader));
00074 
00075         u_int32_t addr = data.Header().GetFirstDataGroupFilePos();
00076         DataGroup dc = data.DataGroup(addr);
00077 
00078         // Check that we can get a DataSet and use it
00079         DataSet* dataPlane = dc.DataSet(0);
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00081 
00082         dataPlane->Open();
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->BytesPerRow() == 2);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Rows() == 100);
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Cols() == 1);
00086 
00087         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00088         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00089         {
00090                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00091                 u_int16_t value;
00092                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00093                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00094         }
00095 
00096         dataPlane->Close();     // optional - Delete will call this
00097         dataPlane->Delete();
00098 }
00099 
00100 /*
00101  * Test retrieving a DataGroup configured to read data using small memory footprint fstream access.
00102  */
00103 void GenericDataFileBasedTest::DataGroupFSreamTest()
00104 {
00105         GenericData data;
00106         GenericFileReader reader;
00107         reader.SetFilename(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE);
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data, GenericFileReader::ReadNoDataGroupHeader));
00109         data.UseMemoryMapping(false);
00110         data.LoadEntireDataSetHint(false);
00111 
00112         u_int32_t addr = data.Header().GetFirstDataGroupFilePos();
00113         DataGroup dc = data.DataGroup(addr);
00114 
00115         // Check that we can get a DataSet and use it
00116         DataSet* dataPlane = dc.DataSet(0);
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00118 
00119         dataPlane->Open();
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->BytesPerRow() == 2);
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Rows() == 100);
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Cols() == 1);
00123 
00124         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00125         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00126         {
00127                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00128                 u_int16_t value;
00129                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00130                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00131         }
00132 
00133         dataPlane->Close();     // optional - Delete will call this
00134         dataPlane->Delete();
00135 }
00136 
00137 void GenericDataFileBasedTest::DataGroupFStreamLoadEntireDataSetTest()
00138 {
00139         GenericData data;
00140         GenericFileReader reader;
00141         reader.SetFilename(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE);
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data, GenericFileReader::ReadNoDataGroupHeader));
00143         data.UseMemoryMapping(false);
00144         data.LoadEntireDataSetHint(true);
00145 
00146         u_int32_t addr = data.Header().GetFirstDataGroupFilePos();
00147         DataGroup dc = data.DataGroup(addr);
00148 
00149         // Check that we can get a DataSet and use it
00150         DataSet* dataPlane = dc.DataSet(0);
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00152 
00153         dataPlane->Open();
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->BytesPerRow() == 2);
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Rows() == 100);
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Cols() == 1);
00157 
00158         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00159         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00160         {
00161                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00162                 u_int16_t value;
00163                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00164                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00165         }
00166 
00167         dataPlane->Close();     // optional - Delete will call this
00168         dataPlane->Delete();
00169 }
